response.overview: "Bagel Box" is a mockumentary that follows Jo, a third-rate actor, as he auditions for a bit part in a commercial that he is certain will send him to stardom.  This film was created by a group of 5 incoming high school freshmen at a week- long filmmakers' day camp hosted by Auburn Public Theater and Cayuga College outside of Syracuse, New York in July of 2019. The group of filmmakers worked under the advisement of Auburn Public Theater's executive director, Carey Eidel, who is also an instructor at Cayuga Community College.
response.title: Bagel Box
